New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers extended their franchise-best winning streak to 15 games, becoming the fourth team in NBA history to begin a season 15-0.
Key Match Events: Darius Garland’s 25 points and Ty Jerome’s 24 points helped carry the Cavaliers
Evan Mobley put up 23 points and 11 rebounds
Jarrett Allen added 21 points and 15 rebounds
Georges Niang contributed 13 points off the bench
Cleveland held a 72-59 halftime lead, shooting 66.7% (26-for-39) from the field
